title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
Meet the muscle your yard’s been missing: the Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart. Built with a rugged steel mesh frame and removable side panels, this cart transforms in seconds from a high-capacity hauler to a flatbed for oversized loads. From mulch and firewood to pavers and plants, its 3 cu ft bed and 400 lb capacity make tough jobs feel easy.

Why you’ll love it:
- Heavy-duty steel construction: Durable steel mesh bed and frame stand up to daily use.
- Versatile design: Quick-release, removable sides convert to a flatbed for bulky items.
- Smooth, stable hauling: 10-inch pneumatic tires, 4-wheel stability, and ample ground clearance glide over grass, gravel, and uneven terrain.
- Easy to maneuver: Tight turn radius and straight pull handle for precise control in tight garden paths.
- Quick assembly: Get up and rolling fast with straightforward setup.
- Built to fit your space: Bed measures 34 in x 18 in; overall height 37 in; weight 36.6 lb.
- Confidence to cart more: Backed by a 1-year limited warranty.
- Classic Green finish that looks great in any yard or job site.

From weekend projects to everyday chores, the GOR400-COM turns heavy lifting into light work. Load it up, roll it out, and get more done with less effort.
